_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: LumenVM
author: unknown@unknown.com
startup: #Thanks for using LumenVM (but better and free)

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt update && apt install -y wget curl

TARGET_DIR="/mnt/server"
mkdir -p "$TARGET_DIR"
cd "$TARGET_DIR"

IMAGE_URL="https://cloud-images.ubuntu.com/releases/jammy/release-20250725/jammy-server-cloudimg-arm64.img"
OUTPUT_FILE="ubuntu-22.qcow2"

echo -e "\nDownloading Ubuntu 22 cloud image..."
wget -O "$OUTPUT_FILE" "$IMAGE_URL"

if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
    echo -e "\nDownload completed successfully."
else
    echo -e "\nFailed to download the image."
    exit 1
fi
